statement.name: INSERT_SMADQP
statement.desc: Inserci√≥n tabla de Documentos por Programa
statement.sql: INSERT INTO smadqp( codcia, nrodqp, tpodqp, nropgm, stddqp, nrodqr, sqlbkr) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)

statement.name: DELETE_SMADQP
statement.desc: Delete tabla de Documentos por Programa
statement.sql: DELETE FROM smadqp WHERE nrodqp=? AND codcia=?
